subject: p16773796
History: -year-old male with clinical concern for left pneumonia.
Findings: Sternotomy wires and mediastinal clips are unchanged as is the prosthetic aortic valve. The heart size is within normal limits. The mediastinal contours appear unremarkable. There continues to be opacity projecting over the heart on the frontal view with air bronchograms which correlates with increased opacity in the retrocardiac space. There is no pneumothorax.
